J

JarDynamicLoader - Class in jmines.persistence
The class used to dynamically load classes contained in jar files.
JarDynamicLoader() - Constructor for class jmines.persistence.JarDynamicLoader
 
jmines - package jmines
This package is organized in 3 sub packages :
- control is the package containing classes to handle user events.
jmines.control - package jmines.control
This package contains all the objects used to handle the user events on the main and game panels.
jmines.control.actions - package jmines.control.actions
This package contains all the action objects used to construct the menus of the main frame menu bar.
jmines.control.actions.board - package jmines.control.actions.board
This package contains all the action objects used to construct the board menu of the main frame menu bar.
jmines.control.actions.displayandsounds - package jmines.control.actions.displayandsounds
This package contains all the action objects used to construct the display menu of the main frame menu bar.
jmines.control.actions.game - package jmines.control.actions.game
This package contains all the action objects used to construct the game menu of the main frame menu bar.
jmines.control.actions.info - package jmines.control.actions.info
This package contains all the action objects used to construct the info menu of the main frame menu bar.
jmines.control.actions.language - package jmines.control.actions.language
This package contains all the action objects used to construct the language menu of the main frame menu bar.
jmines.control.actions.other - package jmines.control.actions.other
This package contains all the action objects used to construct the other menu of the main frame menu bar.
jmines.control.actions.robot - package jmines.control.actions.robot
This package contains all the action objects used to construct the robot menu of the main frame menu bar.
jmines.control.listeners - package jmines.control.listeners
This package contains all the objects used to listen the user events on the main and game panels.
jmines.model - package jmines.model
This package contains all the business classes needed to compute all the in game calculations (like get the neighbors, the number of surrounding mines etc.).
jmines.model.events - package jmines.model.events
This package contains all the needed classes to handle events that can occurs from the business classes.
jmines.persistence - package jmines.persistence
This package contains all the persistence classes : to save and load user configuration.
jmines.view - package jmines.view
This package contains all the Human Machine Interface classes : to display frames and panels and to play sounds.
jmines.view.components - package jmines.view.components
This package contains all the panels classes : the game panel, the LCD panels, the top panel (containing LCD and smiley button) and the main panel containing the previous panels.
jmines.view.dialogs - package jmines.view.dialogs
This package contains all the dialogs classes : to display JMines information, to display best times, to create a custom game and to enter user name.
JMinesAction - Class in jmines.control.actions
The super class of all actions used in JMines.
JMinesAction(String, MainFrame) - Constructor for class jmines.control.actions.JMinesAction
Construct a new JMinesAction.
JMinesAction(String, Icon, MainFrame) - Constructor for class jmines.control.actions.JMinesAction
Construct a new JMinesAction.
